practices.title: Yoga Quickie
practices.description: Yoga is a physical and mental practice that originated in ancient India.
practices.facts: Yoga has been shown to reduce stress, improve flexibility, strengthen muscles, and increase overall physical and mental well-being. Regular practice can also help with chronic pain, depression, and anxiety.

practices.title: Meditation Quickie
practices.description: Meditation is a practice with the goal of achieving a mentally clear and emotionally calm state.
practices.facts: Meditation has been shown to reduce stress and anxiety, improve focus and concentration, increase emotional well-being, and promote better sleep.

practices.title: Stretch Quickie
practices.description: Body stretching should be done daily with the goal of increasing flexibility and range of motion.
practices.facts: Stretching can improve flexibility and range of motion, improve posture and balance, increase blood flow and oxygen to the muscles, and reduce the risk of injury during physical activities.

practices.title: Breathe Quickie
practices.description: Breathing exercises involve focused and intentional breathing techniques, designed to regulate the breath, calm the mind, and reduce stress and tension in the body.
practices.facts: Daily breathing exercises can help reduce stress and anxiety, improve mental clarity and focus, increase oxygen flow to the brain and body, and promote relaxation and better sleep. Regular practice can also support the functioning of the respiratory system.

practices.title: Warm-up Quickie
practices.description: Warm-up exercises are gentle physical activities designed to gradually increase heart rate, blood flow, and body temperature, in preparation for more intense physical activity or as a way to start the day with movement.
practices.facts: When used as a morning routine, warm-up exercises can increase energy levels, improve circulation, and support mental focus and productivity throughout the day.
